snippet.title: The Architect: Paris - A Glimpse At the DRAWING BOARD
snippet.description:
🚀 Available NOW on Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1525620/The_Architect_Paris/?beta=0 ! 🚀 
🎉 15% OFF the first week !!! 🎉

A Glimpse at The Architect: Paris is a series of short gameplay videos about the different environments of the game, its tools, systems and tips from the dev team.

First episode is about the Drawing Board: see how the true heart of the game gives you loads of options to customize your architectural projects!

🔔 Don't forget to subscribe to get the latest news and videos from the game !

🌍 Come visit us on our website : http://www.enodo.games/our-games

📢 Join the community on our social networks to get the latest news:

► Discord : https://discord.gg/8UWznw7VFJ
► Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/TheArchitect...
► Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/the_archite...
► Twitter : https://twitter.com/architect_paris?l...
​► Youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UClv9...​

🎵 Music used: "Faubourg" by H-Pi for The Architect: Paris

#thearchitectparis​ #enodogames​ #drawingboard​ #architecture​ #paris​ #madewithunity​ #unity3D​ #france​ #pcgaming​ #hqgraphics​ #design​ #urbanplanning​ #february2021​ #steam
